A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Had this just focused on the new characters - all wonderfully portrayed - I would have thoroughly enjoyed this movie. But there's no getting around the fact that the fate it hands out to all the original Star Wars characters is utterly unlikable.  It's one thing to offer no challenges to an old crew\, or ask them to pass on the torch\, it's another thing entirely to say that their happy ending became twisted beyond repair and end their stories on a sour note.
